scheme_name: Stipend Scheme For Poultry Farming Training For Weaker Section (Gujarat)
description: This scheme provides a stipend to individuals from weaker sections undergoing poultry farming training to enhance skills and promote self-employment.
key_features: Stipend of Rs. 4,000 per month during training
Focus on skill development for weaker sections

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to economically weaker sections
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Gujarat

steps: Enroll in approved poultry training program
